Title: Waives the central business district toll for New York city sheriffs, undersheriffs or deputy sheriffs acting in their official capacity
Summary: Waives the central business district toll for New York city sheriffs, undersheriffs or deputy sheriffs acting in their official capacity.
LawCode: Amd ยง1704-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to waiving the central business district toll for New York city sheriffs, undersheriffs or deputy sheriffs acting in their official capacity
